```{r packages, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)
library(fontawesome)
library(googlesheets4)

gs4_auth(email = "hgoers@umd.edu")
```

```{r, include = FALSE}
schedule <- read_sheet("1Q_kkuW8X_uHXX7YrzC9P2Wg6ehZ044jMMZX1N1Bl2sE") |> 
  mutate(
    across(TITLE:ASSIGNMENTS, ~ replace_na(.x, "")),
    `CLASS NOTES` = if_else(`CLASS NOTES` != "", 
                      paste0("<a href=\"https://hgoers.github.io/GVPT622/content/", `CLASS NOTES`, "\">", "{{< fa book >}}", "</a>"),
                      "{{< fa book >}}"),
    `SESSION SCRIPTS` = if_else(`SESSION SCRIPTS` != "", 
                      paste0("<a href=\"http://localhost:3933/content/", `SESSION SCRIPTS`, "\">", "{{< fa gears >}}", "</a>"),
                      "{{< fa gears >}}"),
    ASSIGNMENTS = if_else(ASSIGNMENTS != "",
                         paste0("<a href=\"http://localhost:3933/content/", ASSIGNMENTS, "\">", "{{< fa pen-ruler >}}", "</a>"),
                         "{{< fa pen-ruler >}}")
  )
```

```{r schedule, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
schedule |>
  kbl(escape = FALSE, align = "llccc") |>
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("hover", "responsive"),
                fixed_thead = T) |> 
  column_spec(1, width = "12%", extra_css = "padding-right: 20px;") |> 
  column_spec(2, width = "52%") |> 
  column_spec(3, width = "12%") |> 
  column_spec(4, width = "12%") |> 
  column_spec(5, width = "12%")
```
